attributes.comment:
I would like to ask you to not increase the fees associated with international
adoptions. My husband and I are in the process of adopting a girl from China.
We have already been approved by the USCIS and we are awaiting our referral
from China. We are already paying out over $20,000 in order to get our little girl.
We will more than likely have to apply for a second time with the USCIS before
our daughter arrives due to the documents expiring. Please help us by not adding
more of a financial burden on our family. Thank you for your time and
consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Candice Smith
